scripts.build:ui: rm -rf react-ui/v1 && cd ../../FullStack2020/part5/bloglist-frontend && npm run build --prod && cp -r build/ ../../../backend2020/part4-blogList/react-ui/app-1
scripts.build:ui-v2: rm -rf react-ui/app-2-with-redux-styles && cd ../../FullStack2020/part7/bloglist-part7-with-redux-navigation-styles && npm run build --prod && cp -r build/ ../../../backend2020/part4-blogList/react-ui/app-2-with-redux-styles
scripts.deploy:full: npm run build:ui && npm run build:ui-v2 && git add . && git commit -m uibuild && npm run deploy
